<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpoolinterface">ThreadPoolInterface</a></>}>
This defines the abstract base interface for a ThreadPool allowing asynchronous parallel execution on a defined number of threads. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpoolinterface/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpooltaskgroup">ThreadPoolTaskGroup</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This defines the abstract base interface for a ThreadPool allowing</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// asynchronous parallel execution on a defined number of threads.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// It is possible to reuse one thread pool for different groups of tasks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// by grouping tasks using ThreadPoolTaskGroup. All tasks are processed using</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the same queue, but it is possible to wait only for a specific group of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// tasks to finish.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// It is also possible for worker threads to submit new tasks and wait for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// them. Note that this may result in a deadlock in cases such as when a task</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// (directly or indirectly) tries to wait for its own completion, or when all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// available threads are used up by tasks waiting for a task that has no thread</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// left to run on (this includes waiting on the returned future). It should be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// generally safe to wait() for a group as long as groups do not form a cycle.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpoolinterface"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpoolinterface">ThreadPoolInterface</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The actual method to enqueue a task to be defined by the concrete</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// implementation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> asyncEnqueue(std::function&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight">()&gt; Task,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpooltaskgroup">ThreadPoolTaskGroup</a> &#42;Group) = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Destroying the pool will drain the pending tasks and wait. The current</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// thread may participate in the execution of the pending tasks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpoolinterface/#abe20bbefd5e591081ad9ac5c19eedb5a"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpoolinterface/#abe20bbefd5e591081ad9ac5c19eedb5a">~ThreadPoolInterface</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Blocking wait for all the threads to complete and the queue to be empty.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// It is an error to try to add new tasks while blocking on this call.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Calling wait() from a task would deadlock waiting for itself.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpoolinterface/#a0ea46b29f97f4f535c563a68a38185a4"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpoolinterface/#a0ea46b29f97f4f535c563a68a38185a4">wait</a>() = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Blocking wait for only all the threads in the given group to complete.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// It is possible to wait even inside a task, but waiting (directly or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// indirectly) on itself will deadlock. If called from a task running on a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// worker thread, the call may process pending tasks while waiting in order</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// not to waste the thread.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpoolinterface/#ad4dbcf0b0e80230eb3f28d30672eff19"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpoolinterface/#ad4dbcf0b0e80230eb3f28d30672eff19">wait</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpooltaskgroup">ThreadPoolTaskGroup</a> &amp;Group) = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Returns the maximum number of worker this pool can eventually grow to.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpoolinterface/#a6ec7a595fe1af1fa5204286641a356fc"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">virtual</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpoolinterface/#a6ec7a595fe1af1fa5204286641a356fc">getMaxConcurrency</a>() </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Asynchronous submission of a task to the pool. The returned future can be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// used to wait for the task to finish and is &#42;non-blocking&#42; on destruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight">... <Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpoolinterface/#ad43d0052f680e6ac08426d8821df178d"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpoolinterface/#ad43d0052f680e6ac08426d8821df178d">async</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>, Args &amp;&amp;...ArgList) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">private</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Asynchronous submission of a task to the pool. The returned future can be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// used to wait for the task to finish and is &#42;non-blocking&#42; on destruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ResTy&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::shared&#95;future&lt;ResTy&gt; asyncImpl(std::function&lt;ResTy()&gt; Task,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpooltaskgroup">ThreadPoolTaskGroup</a> &#42;Group) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Future = std::async(std::launch::deferred, std::move(Task)).share();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">    asyncEnqueue(&#91;Future&#93;() &#123; Future.wait(); &#125;, Group);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Future;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#if LLVM&#95;ENABLE&#95;THREADS</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A ThreadPool implementation using std::threads.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The pool keeps a vector of threads alive, waiting on a condition variable</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// for some work to become available.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight">StdThreadPool : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpoolinterface">ThreadPoolInterface</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Construct a pool using the hardware strategy \\p S for mapping hardware</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// execution resources (threads, cores, CPUs)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Defaults to using the maximum execution resources in the system, but</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// accounting for the affinity mask.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">  StdThreadPool(ThreadPoolStrategy S = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a00440f10281348fd9f7be52e23c7c874">hardware&#95;concurrency</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Blocking destructor: the pool will wait for all the threads to complete.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ~StdThreadPool() </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">override</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Blocking wait for all the threads to complete and the queue to be empty.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// It is an error to try to add new tasks while blocking on this call.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Calling wait() from a task would deadlock waiting for itself.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> wait() </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">override</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Blocking wait for only all the threads in the given group to complete.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// It is possible to wait even inside a task, but waiting (directly or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// indirectly) on itself will deadlock. If called from a task running on a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// worker thread, the call may process pending tasks while waiting in order</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// not to waste the thread.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> wait(ThreadPoolTaskGroup &amp;Group) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">override</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Returns the maximum number of worker threads in the pool, not the current</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// number of threads!</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> getMaxConcurrency()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const override </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxThreadCount; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: Remove, misleading legacy name warning!</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/compiler-h/#a2166e563f0a3060d24f8b53a6d995ad6">LLVM&#95;DEPRECATED</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Use getMaxConcurrency instead&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;getMaxConcurrency&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">  unsigned getThreadCount()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxThreadCount; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Returns true if the current thread is a worker thread of this thread pool.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> isWorkerThread() </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">private</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Returns true if all tasks in the given group have finished (nullptr means</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// all tasks regardless of their group). QueueLock must be locked.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> workCompletedUnlocked(ThreadPoolTaskGroup &#42;Group) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Asynchronous submission of a task to the pool. The returned future can be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// used to wait for the task to finish and is &#42;non-blocking&#42; on destruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> asyncEnqueue(std::function&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight">()&gt; Task,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    ThreadPoolTaskGroup &#42;Group)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> override </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> requestedThreads;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Lock the queue and push the new task</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">      std::unique&#95;lock&lt;std::mutex&gt; LockGuard(QueueLock);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t allow enqueueing after disabling the pool</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(EnableFlag &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Queuing a thread during ThreadPool destruction&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Tasks.emplace&#95;back(std::make&#95;pair(std::move(Task), Group));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">      requestedThreads = ActiveThreads + Tasks.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">    QueueCondition.notify&#95;one();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">    grow(requestedThreads);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Grow to ensure that we have at least &#96;requested&#96; Threads, but do not go</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// over MaxThreadCount.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> grow(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> requested);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> processTasks(ThreadPoolTaskGroup &#42;WaitingForGroup);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Threads in flight</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::vector&lt;llvm::thread&gt; Threads;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Lock protecting access to the Threads vector.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">mutable</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sys/#aa3f166e8bb27e1c9a1e5cbb439e9749b">llvm::sys::RWMutex</a> ThreadsLock;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Tasks waiting for execution in the pool.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::deque&lt;std::pair&lt;std::function&lt;void()&gt;, ThreadPoolTaskGroup &#42;&gt;&gt; Tasks;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Locking and signaling for accessing the Tasks queue.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::mutex QueueLock;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::condition&#95;variable QueueCondition;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Signaling for job completion (all tasks or all tasks in a group).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::condition&#95;variable CompletionCondition;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Keep track of the number of thread actually busy</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ActiveThreads = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Number of threads active for tasks in the given group (only non-zero).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">  DenseMap&lt;ThreadPoolTaskGroup &#42;, unsigned&gt; ActiveGroups;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Signal for the destruction of the pool, asking thread to exit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EnableFlag = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ThreadPoolStrategy Strategy;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Maximum number of threads to potentially grow this pool to.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaxThreadCount;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LLVM&#95;ENABLE&#95;THREADS</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A non-threaded implementation.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/singlethreadexecutor"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/singlethreadexecutor/#a3a0e760e0380aa0023a27372d5ffd4dc">SingleThreadExecutor</a> : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpoolinterface">ThreadPoolInterface</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Construct a non-threaded pool, ignoring using the hardware strategy.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/singlethreadexecutor/#a3a0e760e0380aa0023a27372d5ffd4dc">SingleThreadExecutor</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpoolstrategy">ThreadPoolStrategy</a> ignored = &#123;&#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Blocking destructor: the pool will first execute the pending tasks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/singlethreadexecutor/#a551b6b62422a531ea1b88f57071afca1">~SingleThreadExecutor</a>() </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">override</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Blocking wait for all the tasks to execute first</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/singlethreadexecutor/#a4a9fc38bb7d9ff3f944e25971330cb42">wait</a>() </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">override</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Blocking wait for only all the tasks in the given group to complete.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/singlethreadexecutor/#a4a9fc38bb7d9ff3f944e25971330cb42">wait</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpooltaskgroup">ThreadPoolTaskGroup</a> &amp;Group) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">override</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Returns always 1: there is no concurrency.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/singlethreadexecutor/#ac7bf90e52e4cf7b2190d1d976527b025"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/singlethreadexecutor/#ac7bf90e52e4cf7b2190d1d976527b025">getMaxConcurrency</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const override </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 1; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: Remove, misleading legacy name warning!</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/compiler-h/#a2166e563f0a3060d24f8b53a6d995ad6">LLVM&#95;DEPRECATED</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Use getMaxConcurrency instead&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;getMaxConcurrency&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/singlethreadexecutor/#a671af7165066753366fd0dcde0d560c9"><span class="doxyHighlight">  unsigned <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/singlethreadexecutor/#a671af7165066753366fd0dcde0d560c9">getThreadCount</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 1; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Returns true if the current thread is a worker thread of this thread pool.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/singlethreadexecutor/#ac4f1263cc6c0e4c711a1936736d61db6">isWorkerThread</a>() </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">private</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Asynchronous submission of a task to the pool. The returned future can be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// used to wait for the task to finish and is &#42;non-blocking&#42; on destruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> asyncEnqueue(std::function&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight">()&gt; Task,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlight">                    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpooltaskgroup">ThreadPoolTaskGroup</a> &#42;Group)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> override </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Tasks.emplace&#95;back(std::make&#95;pair(std::move(Task), Group));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Tasks waiting for execution in the pool.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::deque&lt;std::pair&lt;std::function&lt;void()&gt;, ThreadPoolTaskGroup &#42;&gt;&gt; Tasks;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#if LLVM&#95;ENABLE&#95;THREADS</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab2b4a8794a239fc36c52ec91b23c0296">DefaultThreadPool</a> = StdThreadPool;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab2b4a8794a239fc36c52ec91b23c0296"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">using </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab2b4a8794a239fc36c52ec91b23c0296">DefaultThreadPool</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/singlethreadexecutor">SingleThreadExecutor</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// A group of tasks to be run on a thread pool. Thread pool tasks in different</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// groups can run on the same threadpool but can be waited for separately.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// It is even possible for tasks of one group to submit and wait for tasks</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// of another group, as long as this does not form a loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpooltaskgroup"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpooltaskgroup/#afd12a64f20a69db19551fc17380766ea">ThreadPoolTaskGroup</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The ThreadPool argument is the thread pool to forward calls to.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpooltaskgroup/#afd12a64f20a69db19551fc17380766ea"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpooltaskgroup/#afd12a64f20a69db19551fc17380766ea">ThreadPoolTaskGroup</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpoolinterface">ThreadPoolInterface</a> &amp;Pool) : Pool(Pool) &#123;&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Blocking destructor: will wait for all the tasks in the group to complete</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// by calling ThreadPool::wait().</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpooltaskgroup/#abb68d4d5c87b07400ebf71f489ddd4d3"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpooltaskgroup/#abb68d4d5c87b07400ebf71f489ddd4d3">~ThreadPoolTaskGroup</a>() &#123; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpooltaskgroup/#ab4f164d97bb4385520807d75a0c0db5a">wait</a>(); &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Calls ThreadPool::async() for this group.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">template</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typename</span><span class="doxyHighlight">... Args&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpooltaskgroup/#a4a5b93ca9163a7977cc2114eacb65fb0"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpooltaskgroup/#a4a5b93ca9163a7977cc2114eacb65fb0">async</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &amp;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>, Args &amp;&amp;...ArgList) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Pool.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpoolinterface/#ad43d0052f680e6ac08426d8821df178d">async</a>(&#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, std::forward&lt;Function&gt;(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlight">                      std::forward&lt;Args&gt;(ArgList)...);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Calls ThreadPool::wait() for this group.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpooltaskgroup/#ab4f164d97bb4385520807d75a0c0db5a"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpooltaskgroup/#ab4f164d97bb4385520807d75a0c0db5a">wait</a>() &#123; Pool.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/threadpoolinterface/#a0ea46b29f97f4f535c563a68a38185a4">wait</a>(&#42;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">); &#125;</span></CodeLine>
